data.name: Times Table Hunt
data.detailed_description:
Mastering the multiplication table is the basis for arithmetic throughout life.

Times Tables Hunt combines a game that is simply fun with the repetition of exercises. After all, who doesn't like popping balloons?
Two game modes and unlockable extras keep motivation high and motivate your kid to keep practicing.
If you feel that, especially in the current times of school closures, school practice is coming up short, opt for a purposeful, digital support!

“The balloons are really fun to play with, you know” - my nephew, 11, after playing a testing round.



We have developed this game in close cooperation with trained teachers as well as parents of elementary school children.
In line with our mission, we refrain from additional purchase content, advertising and data collection from your children!

Times Tables Hunt is perfect if you want to give your children your tablet and have a clear conscience!



Between you and me, we played more rounds of development than we really needed to test it.


This project is supported by Medienförderung RLP.

data.short_description: A funny game for kids to learn and practice the times tables

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64 bit
  • Processor: 2 Core, 2 GHz, 64 bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7000 series, NVIDIA Geforce 8 series, Intel Ivy Bridge
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10
  • Processor: 2 Core, 2 GHz, 64 bit, M1/Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7000 series, NVIDIA Geforce 8 series, Intel Ivy Bridge
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux 64 bit on x86_64 (e.g. Ubuntu 16.04)
  • Processor: 2 Core, 2 GHz, 64 bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7000 series, NVIDIA Geforce 8 series, Intel Ivy Bridge
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
License information:


We use some components in this app under free and/or open source licenses, including
  • "Basic Font" font by Christian Urff under CC-BY license.
  • "Comic Relief" font by Loudifier under SIL Open Font License v1.10
For the implementation we use the Godot game engine. We would like to thank the creators, developers and all contributors from the community.
For more information on licensed components, please visit our website and follow the link to our legal notice.
